credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Sketchbook Page Showing Elephants Attacked by Troglodytae (above) and a Stag Hunt (below), for engraved series, Venationes, Ferarum, Arium, piscium...
medium: Pen and bistre ink, brush and brown wash on white laid paper
description: Elephants being attacked by pigmy-like men equipped with hatchets.  In the background sections of the elephant meat are carried off, as the fallen animal is cut up; bottom.  Hunt of men on horseback and dogs.  Reverse:  Elephants attacked by serpents, in foreground.  In the background Troplodytae cut up and carry off fallen elephants.
name: Drawing
